reviewText: It's Pink Floyd. How can it be anything other than excellent!?
Enlightenment

Very small disclamer on item....".not authorized by Floyd members". Went into the trash after 10 minutes viewing! Waste of money!!
I thought I was getting Floyd Dark Side of the Moon concert I saw on MTV years ago. Thought Amazon had higher standards. Just goes to show you that anything can be sold on-line.......I guess it's true "Buyer Beware"!
Wow!
Thought it was a movie, or the complete song it was a complete waste of money and my time going through this crap!
Worthless unauthorized (non-Pink Floyd copy)
The discs involves more talking about the making of Dark Side of The Moon, rather than the actual concert. Very disappointed as this was what I was looking for.
Big fan
It was okay my fault I thought it was the music not a Doc.
Love it!
Bait and switch. Wholly disappointing. No full songs. Not even a decent critique. Worthless. Mine is in the garbage too.
Not original singer on it.
There was too little music, and too much history.  The parts that are interesting are expanded too much.  I will get much more enjoyment from the remastered CD - for sure...
Sorry but the cover was worth more then the DVD video

I should have read the other reviews.  Disappointed.  I watched it all the way through with great expectations and it just ended abruptly, with disappointment.  As the box says "...the film is unauthorized, etc..."  If I was a member of Pink Floyd, I wouldn't authorize it either..
This DVD will take you back to fond memories of your youth !!
Should have paid attention to the site reviews before buying this; sucked and had a weird ending that just cut off. Looks like someone burned it on their own dvd burner.

too much talk
